  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:71721478-dcbd-4c5f-aacb-e1766772b111</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>71721478-dcbd-4c5f-aacb-e1766772b111</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A galaxisok térbeli eloszlása</string>
            <string language="en-US">Spreading of galaxies in space</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbreiten der Galaxien im Platz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propagation des galaxies dans l'espace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espalhar das galáxias no espaço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diffusione delle galassie nello spazio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάδοση των γαλαξιών στο διάστημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El separarse de galaxias en espacio</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Két szelet az Univerzumból: a galaxisok térbeli eloszlása két milliárd fényév távolságig. Az ábrán több tízezer galaxis van feltüntetve apró, kék pontként.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Two slices of the Universe: spreading of galaxies in space to two billion-lightyear distance. The figure shows tens of thousands of galaxies as small blue dots</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagászat</string>
            <string language="en-US">astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">világegyetem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">szerkezet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">galaxisrendszer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">kvazár</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Scheiben des Universums: Verbreiten 
der Galaxien im Platz zu zwei billion-lightyear Abstand. Die 
Abbildung zeigt 10 Tausenden Galaxien als kleine blaue Punkte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux parts de l'univers : propagation des 
galaxies dans l'espace à deux distances billion-lightyear. La 
figure montre des dizaines de milliers de galaxies en tant que petits 
points bleus</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Duas fatias do universo: espalhar das 
galáxias no espaço a duas distâncias billion-lightyear. A 
figura mostra dez dos milhares das galáxias como pontos azuis 
pequenos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due fette dell'universo: diffusione delle 
galassie nello spazio a due distanze billion-lightyear. La 
figura mostra i dieci delle migliaia delle galassie come piccoli 
puntini blu</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο φέτες του κόσμου: διάδοση των γαλαξιών στο 
διάστημα στην δισεκατομμύριο- lightyear απόσταση δύο. Ο 
αριθμός εμφανίζει δεκάδες χιλιάδων γαλαξίες ως μικρά μπλε 
σημεία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos rebanadas del universo: el separarse de
galaxias en espacio a dos distancias billion-lightyear. La 
figura muestra diez de millares de galaxias como puntos azules 
pequeños</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αστρονομία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">astronomía</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en-US">It may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
